title: [Admission]PESU EEE VS MSIT IT HELP ME DECIDE PLS
content: According to placements, coding culture, location advantage, faculty, everything and anything possible to consider. There is no info on PESU EEE placements separately on the internet so I'm kinda having trouble deciding,PLS HELP? THANKS!

comments.body: Definitely, dig around as much as u want, u won't be finding placement statistics for EEE, hell I've been here for a year and still haven't met a single EEE student, makes me wonder if they even exist lmao
